New Records: Lionel Messi scored a goal in the match after dealing with a thigh injury sustained during the previous game against Chile
Key Match Events: Lionel Messi sustained a thigh injury after being kicked by Gabriel Suazo of Peru
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina coach Lionel Scaloni planned to rest several starters for the match against Peru
Lionel Messi was dealing with a sore throat and fever prior to the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was to be played at Hard Rock Stadium in Miami Gardens, Florida
